nodes.text: Harkrova I was a terrestrial planet located in the Harkrova system. A barren, sulfurous wasteland, it was the only planet in the star system, holding the first orbital position around a dim yellow star. Harkrova I had a singular, unnamed moon that was home to a former Jedi temple. Both the planet and its star system were named after the ancient astronomer Harkrova, who discovered them long before 4 ABY.
Harkrova I first appeared in Alphabet Squadron, a novel written by Alexander Freed and published in 2019.
